This test plugin demonstrates the advanced overlay windows component capabilities:

  • Create Windows: Click "Open Example Window" to create overlay windows
  • Interact: Drag windows by their title bars, resize using corner handles
  • Focus: Click on windows to bring them to front
  • Close: Use the Ã— button on windows or the "Close" buttons below

Windows are created using: windowManager.createWindow(config)

All interactions are detected using computer vision and mouse tracking!
